actionItems.title: Create detailed technical specification document
actionItems.description: Document the complete technical specification for file modularity including JSON Schema extensions, reference syntax, metadata format, and security controls

actionItems.title: Design validation framework architecture
actionItems.description: Create architectural design for two-phase validation system, dependency resolution engine, and cross-file validation strategies

actionItems.title: Create GitHub issues for Phase 1 implementation
actionItems.description: Break down Phase 1 requirements into specific GitHub issues with clear acceptance criteria, labels, and milestone assignments

actionItems.title: Review and approve technical specification
actionItems.description: All board members review the technical specification document and provide formal approval before implementation begins

actionItems.title: Extend xats schema to support references and metadata
actionItems.description: Implement JSON Schema extensions for $ref support, reference metadata schema, validation configuration, and build manifest format

actionItems.title: Implement reference resolution and validation library
actionItems.description: Create reference implementation library for resolving file references, validating cross-file dependencies, and providing error reporting

actionItems.title: Create authoring guide and implementation examples
actionItems.description: Develop comprehensive documentation including file organization patterns, reference syntax examples, and best practices for modular content creation

actionItems.title: Create comprehensive test suite for reference patterns
actionItems.description: Develop test cases covering valid/invalid reference patterns, circular dependencies, missing files, security edge cases, and performance scenarios

actionItems.title: Conduct community beta testing
actionItems.description: Organize beta testing program with select content authors to validate usability, identify issues, and gather feedback on modular authoring workflow

actionItems.title: Conduct independent security audit
actionItems.description: Arrange third-party security review of file reference implementation, focusing on sandboxing, path traversal prevention, and content integrity controls
